ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mpfconst.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 2 |  | mpfconst.q | |- Q = ran ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) |

| 4 |  | mpfconst.s | |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) |
| 5 |  | mpfconst.r | |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) |
| 6 |  | mpfproj.j | |- ( ph -> J e. I ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) = ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mVar ( S |`s R ) ) = ( I mVar ( S |`s R ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( S |`s R ) = ( S |`s R ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9, 1, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_evlsvar | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) ` ( ( I mVar ( S |`s R ) ) ` J ) ) = ( f e. ( B ^m I ) |-> ( f ` J ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) = ( I mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( S ^s ( B ^m I ) ) = ( S ^s ( B ^m I ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 11, 9, 12, 1 | #P_evlsrhm | |- ( ( I e. V /\ S e. CRing /\ R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) -> ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) e. ( ( I mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) RingHom ( S ^s ( B ^m I ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 3, 4, 5, 13 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) e. ( ( I mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) RingHom ( S ^s ( B ^m I ) ) ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( I mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) ) = ( Base ` ( I mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( S ^s ( B ^m I ) ) ) = ( Base ` ( S ^s ( B ^m I ) ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_rhmf | |- ( ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) e. ( ( I mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) RingHom ( S ^s ( B ^m I ) ) ) -> ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) : ( Base ` ( I mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) ) --> ( Base ` ( S ^s ( B ^m I ) ) ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) : ( Base ` ( I mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) ) --> ( Base ` ( S ^s ( B ^m I ) ) ) -> ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) Fn ( Base ` ( I mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) ) ) |
| 19 | 14, 17, 18 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) Fn ( Base ` ( I mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 9 | #P_subrgring | |- ( R e. ( SubRing ` S ) -> ( S |`s R ) e. Ring ) |
| 21 | 5, 20 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( S |`s R ) e. Ring ) |
| 22 | 11, 8, 15, 3, 21, 6 | #P_mvrcl | |- ( ph -> ( ( I mVar ( S |`s R ) ) ` J ) e. ( Base ` ( I mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) ) ) |
| 23 |  | #P_fnfvelrn | |- ( ( ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) Fn ( Base ` ( I mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) ) /\ ( ( I mVar ( S |`s R ) ) ` J ) e. ( Base ` ( I mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) ) ) -> ( ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) ` ( ( I mVar ( S |`s R ) ) ` J ) ) e. ran ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) ) |
| 24 | 19, 22, 23 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) ` ( ( I mVar ( S |`s R ) ) ` J ) ) e. ran ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) ) |
